channel.title: Where are all the passive mobs?
channel.description: I haven't seen a single passive mob in world 2?

item.title: Where are all the passive mobs?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

lmao…underwater base ftw?

I guess that makes sense though, can’t have them all killed off or else they won’t spawn again. Notch is putting some real world factors in this game now, although, this isn’t one of them I would have preferred lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Where are all the passive mobs?

item.title: Where are all the passive mobs?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:16, topic:420060”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=522619.msg3802173#msg3802173 date=1320110315]

Looks like we’ve made pigs, sheep and cows extinct… That’s gotta be a first.

maybe the community can come together and make a mod for bukkit since i cant find one that makes them spawn like before and cbf making one

Or just get MITB to spawn 2 of every animal then raise the water level on the server by 10.

That would flood my entire village…
[/quote]

Everyone would have a reason to come to my tower and Tarkoff’s island.[/quote]

i wouldnt cause my base would be untouched lol

Read full topic

item.title: Where are all the passive mobs?

no its because you guys missed the part where notch added a feature where mobs would not spawn in an area after all of that species were killed off

[/quote]that’s not good with a 1000x1000 map… do we need conservation policies for endangered animals?[/quote]

maybe a bukkit mod to make em spawn more often…ill do research of and make a topic if i find one
